title: Toby Tyler or Ten Weeks with a Circus

sources.title: Hell in a Circus
sources.description: Life in an itinerant theatrical troupe. A well-acted and well-produced pre-code drama which touches on infidelity and illegitimacy (by '30s standards). The final scenes might be considered an unintentional prediction of the 1944 Hartford circus tragedy. Directed by Victor Schertzinger. Released in 1933. a.k.a. "The Constant Woman". complete print.

metadata.Plot: Taken in by distant members of his family after being orphaned, Toby Tyler runs away to join the circus.
metadata.Writer: Bill Walsh, Lillie Hayward, James Otis Kaler
metadata.Actors: Kevin Corcoran, Henry Calvin, Gene Sheldon
